page.title: DeFi akan Aptos
page.description: Ƙararren jagora na ka'idojin DeFi akan blockchain Aptos

search.no_results: Ba a sami ka'idojin da suka dace da ma'aunin ku ba.
search.search_hint: Bincika da suna, nau'i, ko bayanin

NFT Lending.description: Ari kuɗi ta amfani da NFT a matsayin lamuni ko ba da rance ga masu riƙe NFT

Uncollateralized Lending.name: Ba da Lamuni mara izini
Uncollateralized Lending.description: Lamuni ba tare da lamuni ba, bisa la'akari da ƙima ko ƙima

Liquid Staking.description: Tsarin hannun jari yayin karɓar rasit ɗin kasuwanci don kiyaye yawan kuɗi

Restaking.description: Yi amfani da riga-kafin rikodi don tabbatar da ƙarin ladabi don ƙarin lada

Liquid Restaking.description: Sake dawo da alamun ruwa wanda za'a iya ciniki ko amfani dashi a cikin DeFi

Liquidity Manager.name: Mai sarrafa Liquidity
Liquidity Manager.description: Kayan aiki ko ƙa'idodi waɗanda ke ingantawa da daidaita ma'aunin ruwa a cikin wuraren waha

Leveraged Farming.name: Ƙarfafa Noma
Leveraged Farming.description: Ari kuɗi don ƙara yawan samar da ruwa da haɓaka ladan noma

Yield Aggregator.description: Nemo ku canza ta atomatik tsakanin mafi kyawun damar amfanin gona

Prediction Market.description: Fare akan abubuwan da suka faru na ainihi da sakamako ta amfani da crypto

Launchpad.description: Kaddamar da sababbin alamu tare da rarraba gaskiya da fasalin al'umma

Multiple.name: Da yawa
Multiple.description: Ka'idojin bayar da samfuran DeFi da yawa a cikin nau'i daban-daban

mirage.description: Layer ruwa mai hadeɗuwa wanda ke kunna DeFi mai zuwa. Ajiye haɗin gwiwa sannan aro lamuni na stablecoin mai biya kai tsaye ta hanyar perps tare da har zuwa 100x leverage.
mirage.feeStructure: Tsarin kuɗi mai canji dangane da ƙarar ciniki da girman matsayi. Farashin gasa don cinikin perps futures.

integration.description: Perps gaba ɗaya na kan-chain tare da ƙwarewar CEX. Duk matsayi, vaults, da oda suna alamar NFT don cinikin kasuwar sakandare.

protocol_descriptions.Panora: Wani "meta-DEX" wanda ke haɗuwa da littafin oda na kan-layi da AMMs 10+, yana rarraba oda tsakanin wuraren da ke sarrafa jerin alamomin da ke sabuntawa ta atomatik a cikin UI ɗinsa.
protocol_descriptions.Kana: Tushen musayar ciniki a kan sarkakiya tara; kwangilar Paymaster yana ba masu amfani damar kasuwanci akan Aptos ba tare da riƙe APT azaman gas ba; injin kwangiloli masu dawwama na tushen littafin oda.
protocol_descriptions.Thetis: Thetis yana haɗa mai tarawa na dama, kwangiloli masu dawwama na 50× da wuraren jagorancin ruwa (LBPs) a ƙarƙashin rufin ɗaya.
protocol_descriptions.Anqa: Yana da'awar samun rufewar ruwa na 99% akan DEXs 15+ na Aptos; yana ba da samfurin ainihin lokaci kafin sa hannu don duba zamewa, kuma yana ba da damar sarrafa musayar alamu masu yawa don ajiye gas.
protocol_descriptions.LiquidSwap: AMM na tutoci na Pontem kuma DEX na farko da ya sauka akan Aptos mainnet; yana bayar da wuraren Uniswap-V2 na gargajiya, kwayoyin musayar kwanciyar hankali da ƙirar ruwa mai taro da aka tabbatar.
protocol_descriptions.Econia: Littafin oda na kan-layi mai ban mamaki da aka daidaita don haɗin kai mai kyau na Aptos; yana sarrafa kasuwanni a layi daya da kammala kasa da daƙiƙa ɗaya kuma yana fallasa cikakken stack na REST/MQTT data.
protocol_descriptions.Cellana: AMM ve(3,3) inda masu zaɓen veNFT ke jagorantar fitarwa kuma suna karɓar 100% na kudaden shiga.
protocol_descriptions.PancakeSwap: DEX na tutoci na Binance ya kwafi AMM V2 ɗinsa zuwa Move kuma ya haɗa wasu ruwaye CAKE zuwa Aptos.
protocol_descriptions.SushiSwap: Sushi ya aiwatar da haɗin kai na farko mara EVM, yana ba da damar tushen kan-sarkar yayin riƙe UX na Trident router na saba.
protocol_descriptions.Hyperion: Wani gaba ɗaya na kan-sarkar haɗin littafin oda + CL-AMM, yana amfani da ƙididdigi na Aptos don ciniki mai yawan mita.
protocol_descriptions.Tapp: DEX na farko mai kunna kugiya na Uniswap V4 akan testnet na Aptos; hooks na kwangila masu wayo suna ba da damar gine-gine su haɗa wuraren al'ada yayin da masu amfani ke samun musayar da za a iya tsarawa.
protocol_descriptions.Merkle: Wani DEX perp mai wasa tare da XP, akwatunan ganima da 150× leverage; sama da dalar Amurka biliyan 200 jimlar ciniki.
protocol_descriptions.AGDEX: Yana ba da kwangiloli masu dawwama na gabaɗaya 1-100× margin, kiyaye ƙananan zamewa ga masu ciniki marasa babba ta hanyar tasirin oracle mai ƙanƙanta.
protocol_descriptions.Pump: Kowa zai iya ƙirƙira alamomin meme ta hanyar kwayoyin dauri; kowane alama ana sakamakonsa da gaskiya ba tare da pre-sales ko rabon ƙungiya ba.
protocol_descriptions.Emojicoin: Yana ba masu amfani damar ƙirƙira alamomi waɗanda ke daidaitawa da alamomin Unicode emoji; kowane ƙaddamarwa yana amfani da Econia's CL-AMM curve don ganowa da bita na nan take.
protocol_descriptions.Aries: Kasuwar kuɗi irin na Compound na farko akan Aptos, da haɓakawa 90% LTV E-Mode, haɗaɗɗen gadoji da ciniki dama a cikin interface ɗaya.
protocol_descriptions.Superposition: Dandali na sarrafa haɗari na ci-gaba wanda aka yi wahayi daga Bank of England FHS VaR, yana ba da damar samun albarkatu mai leverage tare da sa ido kan haɗari na ainihin lokaci da daidaitawa mai canji na lamuni.
protocol_descriptions.Joule: Yana haɗa wuraren lamuni masu keɓe da "wuraren bugun ruwa" don noma mai leverage.
protocol_descriptions.Echelon: Cibiyar lamuni da ke goyan bayan E-Mode da kuma kasuwanni masu keɓe.
protocol_descriptions.Aptin: Dandali na lamuni mai sa tsaro da farko, yana amfani da Move Prover don tabbatarwa da kula da haɗarin wuraren keɓe.
protocol_descriptions.Meso: Lamuni mai tasiri na babban jari tare da iyakokin bashi da masu amfani za su iya saituninsa da module na tsaro don tallafawa rashin iya biyan bashin protocol.
protocol_descriptions.TruFin: Liquid staking na darajar kasuwanci; masu amfani suna saka hannun jari APT don samun TruAPT.
protocol_descriptions.Amnis: Tsarin alamomi biyu yana ba da stAPT (mai samar da amfanin ƙasa) da amAPT (kwanciyar hankali), yana ba masu amfani damar canzawa tsakanin amfanin ƙasa da kwanciyar hankali yayin da ke mayar da kuɗaden aikin da aka yi ga masu saka hannun jari.
protocol_descriptions.Kofi: Liquid staking da aka haɓaka da MEV tare da ɗakin ajiya na LSD mai leverage.
protocol_descriptions.Ichi: Automated liquidity manager vaults yana ba wa ayyuka damar bayar da ruwa na gefe ɗaya; haɓakan range da ke dacewa don rage asarar da ba ta daɗe ba yayin da ma'ajin ke samun kuɗin ciniki a cikin alamarsa ta asali.
protocol_descriptions.Vibrant X: Mai haɓaka amfanin ƙasa da dashboard na portfolio, yana sake rarraba ajiya zuwa wuraren Aptos masu mafi girman APY.
protocol_descriptions.Moar: Yana ginin Layer na noma mai leverage tare da asusun credit na kan-protocols, yana ba masu amfani damar ari a wuri ɗaya, aiwatarwa a wani wuri.
protocol_descriptions.Thala: Suite na aikace-aikacen DeFi tare da AMM mai wuraren da yawa, stablecoin MOD mai haɗin gwiwa da liquid staking ta hanyar sthAPT da thAPT.
protocol_descriptions.Mirage: A composable liquidity layer powering DeFi's next frontier. Deposit collateral and borrow a self-repaying stablecoin loan powered by perpetuals. Features fully on-chain perps with CEX-like experience, instant execution, low fees, and up to 100x leverage.

stats.total_protocols_tooltip: Jimlar adadin ka'idojin DeFi da aka bibiya

messages.no_protocols: Ba a sami ka'idojin da suka dace da ma'aunin ku ba.
messages.try_clearing_filters: Yi gwada share masu tacewa ko kalmomin bincike.
